name: Material Purchase History
query:
SELECT
    po_item.item_code as "Material Code:Link/Item:120",
	po_item.item_name as "Material Name::120",
    po_item.item_group as "Material Group:Link/Item Group:120",
	po_item.description as "Material Description::150",
	po_item.qty as "PO Qty:Float:100",
	po_item.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:80",
	po_item.base_rate as "Rate:Currency:120",
	po_item.base_amount as "Amount:Currency:120",
	po.name as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:120",
	po.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date:140",
	po.supplier as "Vendor:Link/Supplier:130",
    sup.supplier_name as "Vendor Name::150",
    sup.supplier_type as "Vendor Type:Link/Supplier Type:150",
    CASE WHEN sup.inter_company = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "DHI Owned Company?::120",
	po_item.project as "Project:Link/Project:130",
	ifnull(po_item.received_qty, 0) as "Received Qty:Float:120",
	po.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
FROM
	`tabPurchase Order` po, `tabPurchase Order Item` po_item, `tabSupplier` sup
WHERE
	po.name = po_item.parent and po.supplier = sup.name and po.docstatus = 1
ORDER BY po.name desc
